item.title: How test-time scaling unlocks hidden reasoning abilities in small language models (and allows them to outperform LLMs)
item.description: A 1B small language model can beat a 405B large language model in reasoning tasks if provided with the right test-time scaling strategy.

item.title: Together AI’s $305M bet: Reasoning models like DeepSeek-R1 are increasing, not decreasing, GPU demand
item.description: The demands of DeepSeek's advanced reasoning capabilities are pushing enterprises toward Together AI's optimized infrastructure platform.

item.title: OpenAI’s ChatGPT explodes to 400M weekly users, with GPT-5 on the way
item.description: OpenAI's ChatGPT reaches 400M weekly users and doubles enterprise adoption to 2M+ users, signaling major AI shift as company prepares GPT-5 launch ami...

item.title: Medical training’s AI leap: How agentic RAG, open-weight LLMs and real-time case insights are shaping a new generation of doctors at NYU Langone
item.description: NYU Langone has built an LLM research companion and medical advisor, and is pioneering what it calls AI-driven “precision medical education."

item.title: Identity is the breaking point — get it right or zero trust fails
item.description: It’s on security leaders to shift their security strategies to better fight against identity-driven attacks.
